snippet: Jury selection is set to begin Monday in the case of the former Philadelphia sportscaster Donald Tollefson, who is charged with stealing more than $300,000 by selling fake sports-themed trips.
abstract: Jury selection will begin for trial of Donald Tollefson, former sportscaster charged with stealing over $300,000 by selling tickets to fake sports-themed trips.
lead_paragraph: Jury selection is set to begin Monday in the case of the former Philadelphia sportscaster Donald Tollefson, who is charged with stealing more than $300,000 by selling fake sports-themed trips.

headline.main: Theft Case Set for Trial in Pennsylvania
